 (multipart/mixed)

MIME element (text/plain)
November, 21, 2006 
 
 
 
 
Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures 
 
IP Address:                             74.52.101.8 ( 
http://www.central-subtitles.com) 
 
Date of Infringement:    November, 21, 2006 
 
 
 
 
 
Dear The Planet: 
 
 
 
 
 
ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the
following motion picture production and distribution
companies: 
 
 
 
 
 
*Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.* 
 
*Disney Enterprises, Inc.* 
 
*Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.* 
*Paramount Pictures Corporation* 
 
*TriStar Pictures, Inc.* 
 
*Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation* 
 
*United Artists Pictures, Inc.* 
 
*United Artists Corporation* 
 
*Universal City Studios, LLLP* 
 
*Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.* 
 
 
 
 
 
We have received information that, on the above noted date, the following IP 
addresses, were used to offer or to materially contribute to the offering of 
streaming or downloadable copies of copyrighted motion pictures. 
 
 
 
 The title(s) offered included, but were not limited to: 
 
 
 
 
 
Original Heading:  Pirates of Caribbean
dmca.principal_name: Adepi - Associa de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual
